shooter Documentation

Shooter game project documentation.

The Shooter Game

Overview

See MainComponent documentation for the specific messages sent by the shootergame.app (Mac) or shootergame.exe (Windows). This project is designed as a shell project into which sounds can be impemented (e.g., in FMOD). Messages are sent from the game which can be used to trigger and control sounds.

Game control

Commands are:

  • arrow keys: move around (or a/d/s/w)
  • shift key: run (in conjunction with the arrow keys)
  • space bar: jump
  • mouse pointer: change viewing angle (look around)
  • mouse button (left): shoot (reload is automatic when the gun needs reloading)
  • 1: Choose gun
  • 2: Choose grenade launcher
  • alt key: zoom (for shooting)
  • control key: toggle crouching / standing position
  • esc, m or p: menu (pauses game)

Sounds to implement

The main sounds to implement are:

  • soldier footsteps for different surfaces
  • weapon firing and reloading sounds for both gun and grenades
  • bullet strikes for different surfaces
  • grenade explosions
  • various water sounds
  • reverbs for certain locations like buildings and above/below the bridge
  • overall ambience
